description: Mercury is the closest planet to the Sun and has a very thin atmosphere.
Venus has a thick atmosphere and is the hottest planet in our solar system.
Earth is the third planet from the Sun and the only one known to support life.
Mars is known as the Red Planet and has the largest volcano in the solar system.
Jupiter is the largest planet in the solar system and has a Great Red Spot.
Saturn is famous for its beautiful rings made of ice and rock.
Uranus is a gas giant with a unique sideways rotation.
Neptune is known for its strong winds and is the farthest planet from the Sun.
